mapper.select: SELECT course_seq courseSeq, manager_id managerId, course_number courseNumber, academy_location academyLocation, course_name courseName, course_start_date courseStartDate, course_end_date courseEndDate, subject, course_type courseType, total_training_days totalTrainingDays, training_hours_of_date trainingHoursOfDate, professor_name professorName, max_students maxStudents, is_active isActive FROM courses WHERE course_seq = #{courseSeq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO courses (manager_id, course_number, academy_location, course_name, course_start_date, course_end_date, subject, course_type, total_training_days, training_hours_of_date, professor_name, max_students) values (#{managerId}, #{courseNumber}, #{academyLocation}, #{courseName}, #{courseStartDate}, #{courseEndDate}, #{subject}, #{courseType}, #{totalTrainingDays}, #{trainingHoursOfDate}, #{professorName}, #{maxStudents})
mapper.update: update courses set is_active = 'F' where course_seq = #{courseSeq};
